query:
ALTER TABLE ideas 
ADD COLUMN naqla2_project_id INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN naqla3_asset_id INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN overall_score INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN classification_path VARCHAR(500) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN cluster_id INT DEFAULT NULL;
